post.description: This API updates multiple tasks at once.
This API deletes the given spam tasks

get.description: This API fetches a task from your help desk portal.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional information related to the task. Values allowed are: @contacts@, @assignee@,@tickets@,@teams@,@creator@.

schema.description: Additional information related to the task. Values allowed are: @contacts@, @assignee@,@tickets@,@teams@,@creator@.

patch.description: This API helps update the details of a task.

post.description: This API deletes all spam tasks.

get.description: This API lists tasks related to a particular account.

post.description: This API moves task entries to the Recycle Bin of your help desk portal.

get.description: This API lists tasks related to a particular contact.
This API fetches a particular number of tasks, based on the limit specified.

post.description: This API creates a task in your help desk portal.

get.description: This API lists all tasks associated with a particular ticket.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional information related to the task. Values allowed are: @contacts@, @assignee@,@tickets@,@teams@,@projects@.

schema.description: Additional information related to the task. Values allowed are: @contacts@, @assignee@,@tickets@,@teams@,@projects@.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts the tasks by a specific attribute: @dueDate@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes a descending order of sorting.

schema.description: Key that sorts the tasks by a specific attribute: @dueDate@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes a descending order of sorting.

get.description: This API returns the number of tasks in your help desk.

parameters.name: viewId
parameters.description: ID of the view to apply while fetching the resources

schema.description: ID of the view to apply while fetching the resources

parameters.name: dueDate
parameters.description: Filter by task duedate. Values allowed are @Overdue@, @Tomorrow@, @CurrentWeek@, @CurrentMonth@ and @Today@. You can include both values by separating them with a comma

schema.description: Filter by task duedate. Values allowed are @Overdue@, @Tomorrow@, @CurrentWeek@, @CurrentMonth@ and @Today@. You can include both values by separating them with a comma

parameters.name: assignee
parameters.description: Key that filters tasks by assignee. A valid assigneeId must be passed for this parameter. Multiple assigneeIds can be passed as comma-separated values.

schema.description: Key that filters tasks by assignee. A valid assigneeId must be passed for this parameter. Multiple assigneeIds can be passed as comma-separated values.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: Key that filters tasks by assignee. A valid assigneeId must be passed for this parameter. Multiple assigneeIds can be passed as comma-separated values.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Time interval before which the reminder must be triggered. The value must denote the number of minutes.
